<< true but it would save alot of argueing and egotrips with the poll. >>

(But then where's the fun of it all?  A popularity contest could elect the 
weakest, most pathetic RPGer, like Rdahl :) j/k, and make him win when there

It wouldn't make sense or be fair.)
